metadata.title: Microsoft faces uphill climb to turn enterprise dominance into widespread AI chatbot adoption
metadata.description: At Microsoft's annual Ignite conference this week, IT buyers explained why Microsoft isn't seeing runaway success with its Copilot AI assistant.
metadata.author: Jordan Novet
metadata.keywords: Software,Sundar Pichai,Satya Nadella,Satya Nadella,Instacart (Maplebear Inc),Pinterest Inc,Workday Inc,Salesforce Inc,Adobe Inc,Microsoft Corp,Amazon.com Inc,NVIDIA Corp,Alphabet Class A,Business,Technology,Breaking News: Technology,Enterprise,business news
